Articles.Content:
Samson Explorer One

This one is still in progress, the shuttles need landing legs adjusted, I've landed one similar to these during testing on Kerbin, you can see them on the launch pad picture below, they handle fairly well even after adding the X-Wings. The Mother ship is going to need some adjusting also for better control because I'm losing a lot of fuel fighting with it.

The plan for now is to get into orbit around the Mun and be able to undock from the Mother Ship, Land on the Mun for research and science then return to the Mother Ship. Future plans would be to return to Kerbin Orbit for refueling at a Space Station. I am also considering using another Launcher, this one was my first pick during the testing.
